item.description: So here I am, me, naked, starting a blog. I must admit, I’m shy and I don’t have any courage. I’ve always been this way. I lack the courage to make decisions, to commit, to trust myself. I’ve always wondered if people will accept me and I’ve tried my best to please and impress people. This led to a stagnation stage. I was too afraid of trying new things, learning, experimenting, trusting.
